title: E-Commerce Graphic Designer
job_overview:
We’re looking for a talented and creative full-time Graphic Designer to join our team! If you have experience designing high converting and effective ads, and have a solid understanding of design principles, we want to hear from you.

Add your portfolio as well. No e-commerce advertising portfolio = your application being skipped.

What You’ll Do:

- Create high converting graphics for ads across various platforms such as Facebook & Instagram
- Work closely with our marketing team to brainstorm and bring fresh ideas to life
- Make sure all your designs align with our brand and project goals
- Stay on top of the latest design trends and bring new ideas to your projects
- Juggle multiple tasks and meet deadlines while keeping the quality high

What We’re Looking For:

- You’re a creative powerhouse with A-level design skills
- You’ve got experience as a graphic designer, with a portfolio full of advertising content
- You’re skilled with design software (Adobe Creative Suite, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Canva)
- You understand design principles, typography, and color theory
- You communicate clearly in English, both in writing and speaking (Put cheese in your title)
- You can work well independently and as part of a team
- Bonus if you’ve worked with ClickUp
